....................................................................................................................................................................... Including this Remote Controller in a third network: _____________________________________________________________________________________________ a.Highlight the MONSTER text on the screen b. Hold the key/shift TV button for 3 seconds (the remote is now in ZWAVE programming sequence mode) c. Scroll down to select NETWORK and press OK key. d. Select RESET and press the OK key (the network on the remote is now reset) e. The remote will display SUCCESS and return to the previous screen showing the RESET selection f. Press the key/shift button once (This will take you one screen back) g. Scroll up to TRANSFER and press OK key , then select RECEIVE h. Press OK key i. The remote is now in listening mode j. Set the 3rd party controller in the inclusion mode (refer to the vendor’s instructions) If the inclusion process succeeds, the REVOLUTION remote has been changed to an inclusion remote and is now a part of an existing 3rd party network as a secondary controller.
....................................................................................................................................................................... Include devices to the network: _____________________________________________________________________________________________ 1. If you’re not already at the Home screen, press the DEV button to move back one screen at a time until the only two choices appearing are “Monster” and “Add Device.” 2. Use the up/down button to highlight “Monster.” 3. Press and hold the key/shift button for 3 seconds. The menu changes and highlights “Nodes.” 4. Use the up/down button to highlight “All ON/OFF” (a fifth menu choice not displayed among the first three) and press the OK button. 5. Use the up/down button to highlight Include and press the OK button. 6. The LCD screen displays, “Include in All ON/OFF” and awaits a signal from the module you wish to include. Hold the remote near the module and press the pairing button on the module. When the remote receives the signal from the module, the remote’s LCD screen says, “Success.” If the signal doesn’t arrive within 3 seconds, the screen says, “Fail.”
